venue.name: Myles Standish State Forest fire tower

item.description:
Join us to explore the far western part of Myles Standish south of Federal Pond. We'll start from the Fire Tower parking lot on Three Cornered Pond Road off Bare Hill Road.  Join us for breakfast at 8:00 at the Panera Bread in the Shops at Five (in a shopping center on Long Pond Road near Exit 5 off Route 3) if you are able.

Highlights may include the miniature golf course at the Shady Acres campground on Shoestring Road and the Lost Horse bog.

These walks generally cover fairly level ground and run two to three hours depending on your pace.  Bring water and snacks.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Lost Horse Bog
